title: Pasta Tagliatelle /w Prosciutto and Peas
description: Easy and fast recipe good as a dinner after a work day.
story: This is a very easy recipe (so as probably almost all pasta recipes) with very delicious and rich sauce.</br></br>At first peas seemed a bit odd to me in this combination, but after trying it - it all makes sense: peas give freshiness and color. </br></br>You can make this pasta as rich as you like, if you are on a diet - use less cream and add some water from cooking pasta.

ingredients.name: peas
ingredients.preparationNotes: (I use frozen peas: cover them with boiling water for a couple of minutes and then put peas into very cald water with some ice to keep bright green color)

instructions: Cook tagliatelle as it is adviced on packaging minus 2 minutes.
Meanwhile sout√© finely chopped onion on some olive oil.
Add cream and cook for 5 minutes to reduce and thiken it a bit.
Reserve some water from cooking pasta
To get desirable sauce thikness add some cooking water to the sauce if needed
Add cooked tagliatelle, 2/3 sliced proscuitto and peas into the sauce, mix all, cook for 2 minutes
Sprinkle with grated cheese when serving.
